name: Maya and the Wind Orb
description:
Maya and the Wind Orb

Play as Maya, and use her unique ability to throw and then connect to her wind orb in order to traverse the wind lands to make it to the end as fast as possible. Make sure to share your best time :)

Made within 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK game jam where the theme was "Joined Together". Maya is able to be joined together with her wind orb by choosing when to connect with it in order to take any acceleration from the winds affecting the orb.

HTML Info

If the game is laggy in the browser then you may want to either try to running the game in another browser or consider downloading the Windows application below.

Controls:

  • A and D - Move horizontally
  • Left Click - Throw wind orb, click again to return it
  • Hold Spacebar - Connect with the thrown wind orb
  • Esc - Pause game
